Your job is to choose the middle statement that makes the story incoherent / implausible by indicating 1 or 2 in the output. If both sentences are plausible, pick the one that makes less sense.
input: Beginning: Rick had a bad mouse problem at his house. Middle 1: He bought a couple snakes to help get rid of the rates. Middle 2: He bought a couple snares to help get rid of the rats. Ending: Now, he has a snake problem.
